duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform full-stack development with a focus on the Front End for high-traffic, customer-facing platforms.
Deliver digital solutions that drive sales and enhance customer experience.
Contribute to infrastructure, application, integration, data, and security technology.
Engage in UI and API level test automation as well as software development using agile delivery methods.
Utilize cloud-based web applications and native cloud development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent hands-on, real-world experience.
